de.jaret.util.ui.timebars.swing.renderer

类 DefaultRelationRenderer.Line

  • java.lang.Object

  • 封闭类:
    DefaultRelationRenderer

    public class DefaultRelationRenderer.Line
extends java.lang.Object
    Internal line represenation for caching.
    版本:
    $Id: DefaultRelationRenderer.java 1073 2010-11-22 21:25:33Z kliem $
    作者:
    kliem

      relation the line belongs to.

      start y coordinate.
      int y2
      end y coordinate.

        public Line(IIntervalRelation relation,
            int x1,
            int y1,
            int x2,
            int y2)
        Construct a line.
        参数:
        relation - relation the line belongs to
        x1 - start x
        y1 - start y
        x2 - end x
        y2 - end y

    • 方法详细资料

      • hit

        public boolean hit(int x,
                   int y,
                   int tolerance)
        Check whether the line is hit by a certain coordinate.
        参数:
        x - x coord
        y - y coord
        tolerance - the max delta
        返回:
        true if hit
